Moves image running logic to core and uses jib-integration-testing GCP account.
Adds note about 'mvn clean' in README.
Enables Kokoro integration testing for jib-core.
Adds note about running a local Docker registry.
Adds upcoming features to top of README.
Warns the user if an inferred Docker credential helper could not be found.
Updates the README to fit v0.1.1.
Allows use of Maven settings for defining registry credentials.
Changes all extraction paths to use Unix-style path string.
Removes unnecessary check that actually breaks legitimate builds.
Adds support for multiple credential helpers.
Adds XML syntax highlighting to Extended Usage example in README.
Infers common credential helper names from target registry.
remove warning and add experimental badge
Adds developers and SCM to pom.xml.
Adds a logo to the README.
Adds more questions to the FAQ.
Adds jib-maven-plugin testing to Kokoro build script.
Adds support for parsing a base image reference into components.
